name: Hydro DMG
description:
Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
Vaporize: DMG +2 for this instance
Electro-Charged: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Frozen: DMG +1 for this instance, ATK -2 for target's next action
Bloom: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Dendro Core] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
descriptionraw:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, ATK -2 for target's next action
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
